actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to permit the cumulation of amounts in controversy as between members of a class for the purposes of United States district court jurisdiction in class actions.

summary.text: Permits the cumulation of amounts in controversy as between members of a class for the purposes of United States district court jurisdiction in class actions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to permit the cumulation of amounts in controversy as between members of a class for the purposes of United States district court jurisdiction in class actions.
